body_html:
As a temporary workaround, if you comment out the X86_64 bits in the build scripts, you can still build the protobuf and tensorflow libraries. The resultant libraries will work on-device, but attempts to run in the simulator will fail.

alphamule@672da4f
body_text:
As a temporary workaround, if you comment out the X86_64 bits in the build scripts, you can still build the protobuf and tensorflow libraries.  The resultant libraries will work on-device, but attempts to run in the simulator will fail.
alphamule@672da4f
body:
As a temporary workaround, if you comment out the X86_64 bits in the build scripts, you can still build the protobuf and tensorflow libraries.  The resultant libraries will work on-device, but attempts to run in the simulator will fail.

https://github.com/alphamule/tensorflow/commit/672da4fef637c5511fd2cf78a4ac8e710d0efbda
